job_description:
• Proficient in one or more scripting, programming and visualization tools: Python, Java, Tableau, Matlab, Microsoft Suite Recognize, identify, and raise awareness of process anomalies with the motivation of "who needs to know this now.
• " Advanced problem-solver – understanding of data, good data intuition and data visualization skills Hands-on experience in the field of data analytics, preferably with experience querying databases Experience or knowledge of data collection, warehousing systems, and data cleansing In-depth understanding and working knowledge of SPC and Design of Experiments The ability work on multiple tasks concurrently, prioritize issues and tasks We need an intern drawn to creative problem solving and innovative solutions We need someone who wants to work in an exciting and fast paced environment Excellent technical, communication, and analytical skills.
